text: مُهۡطِعِينَ مُقۡنِعِي رُءُوسِهِمۡ لَا يَرۡتَدُّ إِلَيۡهِمۡ طَرۡفُهُمۡۖ وَأَفۡـِٔدَتُهُمۡ هَوَآءٞ
translation: 43. Iyagoo horay u degdegaya (si ay u ajiibaan baaqaha), madaxyadoodu kor u taagan yihiin13, uusan soo noqoneyn arragooda (taagmi indhahu), quluubtoodu- na maran tahay (cabsi darteed).
footnotes: 13. Tani waa xaaladdooda marka laga soo saaro qubuurahooda. Madaxyadooda kor yihiin iyagoo aan meelna jalleeceyn argagax darteed, aan awoodin xitaa inay dib dhugtaan.
